name: The Adventure of the Ugly Blue Thing
name_original: The Adventure of the Ugly Blue Thing
description:
This game is implemented for the game jam, Miz Jam 1, which can be found on https://itch.io/jam/miz-jam-1. The game is powered by an engine I'm currently working on, and the engine is on a very early stage. Therefore if something is not working you are more than welcome to give me some feedback. 

In the game you control a blue creature where you have to defeat various adversaries with magic in order to complete the game. You can collect keys to unlock doors, bottles to increase your mana and hearts to increase your life.

The game is programmed by: Nicolai Wiwe Andersen
The game is implemented in the engine: nWiweEngine
The engine is programmed by Nicolai Wiwe Andersen

The code for the game can be found on: https://github.com/nicolai4321/MizJam1

Art kit from: https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
